# `select_NearestNetwork`

Select nearest network


## Description

Select nearest network


## Usage

```r
select_NearestNetwork(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`get_NearestNetwork`](#getnearestnetwork)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("spat_unit")), list("spatial unit (e.g. \"cell\")")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("feat_type")), list("feature type (e.g. \"rna\", \"dna\", \"protein\")")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("nn_network_to_use")), list("\"kNN\" or \"sNN\"")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("network_name")), list("name of NN network to be used")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("output")), list("return a igraph or data.table object. Default 'igraph'")), 
    "\n", "  ")
